## Overview
analyticaid is designed for making the data analysis easy and less time consuming. The package is based on tidyr, dplyr,srvyr packages.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` {r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mhkhan27/analyticaid")

```
